landing.title: Welcome to Nava AI
landing.subtitle: Transform your ideas into reality with our advanced AI-powered platform. Generate code, create applications, and innovate faster than ever before.
landing.aboutDescription: Nava AI is a next-generation platform that combines artificial intelligence with intuitive design to help developers, creators, and businesses build powerful applications faster. Our mission is to democratize AI and make advanced technology accessible to everyone.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to bring your AI-powered projects to life
landing.creatorsSubtitle: Built by a passionate team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of AI
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of developers and creators using Nava AI to build the future

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
aiPowered.description: Leverage cutting-edge AI models to automate complex tasks and generate intelligent solutions with natural language commands.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast Performance
lightningFast.description: Experience real-time code generation and instant results with our optimized AI engine built for speed and efficiency.

smartCode.title: Smart Code Generation
smartCode.description: Generate production-ready code snippets, complete applications, and technical solutions with context-aware AI assistance.

interactiveSandbox.title: Interactive Sandbox
interactiveSandbox.description: Test and preview your AI-generated code in a live environment with instant feedback and iterative improvements.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data and projects are protected with enterprise-grade security. We prioritize privacy and never share your information.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Workflows
collaborative.description: Work seamlessly with your team, share AI-generated assets, and collaborate on projects in real-time.

home.placeholder: What can I create for you today?

responses.greeting: Hi {{name}}! How can I help you today?
responses.hello: Hello {{name}}! What would you like me to create for you?
responses.howAreYou: I'm doing great! Ready to help you create amazing things with AI. What project are you working on?
responses.whatCanYouDo:

responses.thankYou: You're welcome, {{name}}! Happy to help. Is there anything else you'd like to create?
jokes: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs! üêõ

responses.default: I understand you want to "{{input}}". Let me help you with that! For more complex tasks, try using keywords like 'code', 'website', 'presentation', or ask me math questions!
